lesson_summary: Examine the anatomy of the human eye with expanding and contracting animations.
Includes: the cornea, lens,  myelin, optic nerve, ophthalmic blood vessels, retinal blood vessels, and sclera.
lesson_discussions: Examine the anatomy of the human eye with expanding and contracting animations.
Includes: the cornea, lens,  myelin, optic nerve, ophthalmic blood vessels, retinal blood vessels, and sclera.
